mapper.select: SELECT CS_NUM, CS_TITLE, TO_CHAR(CS_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS CS_DATE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, T1.* FROM (SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC(CS PK_CS) */ * FROM CS WHERE CS_DEL_GB='N' AND CS_WRITER=#{MEM_NUM}) T1 WHERE ROWNUM <= #{END}) WHERE RNUM >= #{START} AND CS_DEL_GB='N'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CS_COUNT FROM CS WHERE CS_WRITER = #{MEM_NUM} AND CS_DEL_GB='N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CS (CS_NUM, CS_SHOP_NUM, CS_TITLE, CS_WRITER, CS_CONTENT, CS_DATE) VALUES (CS_SEQ.NETVAL, #{CS_SHOP_NUM}, #{CS_TITLE}, #{CS_WRITER}, #{CS_CONTENT}, SYSDATE )
mapper.update: UPDATE CS SET CS_DEL_GB='Y' WHERE CS_NUM = #{CS_NUM}
mapper.select: SELECT RNUM, SHOP_NUM, SHOP_NAME, SHOP_ADD FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, T1.* FROM (SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC(SHOP PK_SHOP) */ * FROM SHOP WHERE SHOP_DEL_GB='N' AND SHOP_JOIN_APPROVE='Y') T1 WHERE ROWNUM<=#{END} ) WHERE RNUM>=#{START}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS SHOP_COUNT FROM SHOP WHERE SHOP_DEL_GB='N' AND SHOP_JOIN_APPROVE='Y'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY CS_NUM DESC) AS NUM, C.CS_NUM, C.CS_TITLE, C.CS_CONTENT, C.CS_DATE, M.MEM_NAME FROM CS C, MEMBER M WHERE C.CS_WRITER = M.MEM_NUM AND CS_DEL_GB = 'N' AND CS_SHOP_NUM = #{SHOP_NUM}) WHERE NUM BETWEEN #{START} AND #{END}

SELECT M.MEM_EMAIL, C.CS_NUM, C.CS_SHOP_NUM, C.CS_TITLE, C.CS_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(CS_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS CS_DATE FROM CS C, MEMBER M WHERE C.CS_WRITER = M.MEM_NUM AND CS_NUM = #{CS_NUM} AND CS_DEL_GB = 'N'
SELECT CS_REPLY_NUM, CS_REPLY_CONTENT FROM CS_REPLY WHERE CS_REPLY_NUM = #{CS_NUM}
